# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags
#
# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "controller;flower_basic;flower_emotional_standalone;flower_peripheral;flower_excited_standalone;serial_to_i2c;personality_lighting;tmc2130;tmc2209;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)

# Convert "Home Directory" that may contain unescaped backslashes on Windows


SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/bin/avr-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/bin/avr-g++")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-std=gnu++11 -fno-exceptions -fno-threadsafe-statics -fpermissive -mmcu=atmega328p -Os -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -flto")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu11 -fno-fat-lto-objects -mmcu=atmega328p -Os -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -flto")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "controller")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60002)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=16000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10808)
    add_definitions(-D__AVR_ATmega328P__)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2c")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/SET")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/controller/*.*
    )
endif()

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "serial_to_i2c")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60002)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=16000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10808)
    add_definitions(-D__AVR_ATmega328P__)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2c")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/serial_to_i2c/SET")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/serial_to_i2c/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/serial_to_i2c/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/serial_to_i2c/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/serial_to_i2c/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/serial_to_i2c/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES

    )

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")

    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60002)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=16000000L)

    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10808)
    add_definitions(-D__AVR_ATmega328P__)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/SET")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2c")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "flower_excited_standalone")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60002)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=16000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10808)
    add_definitions(-D__AVR_ATmega328P__)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2c")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/SET")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_excited_standalone/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "flower_peripheral")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60002)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=16000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10808)
    add_definitions(-D__AVR_ATmega328P__)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2c")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/SET")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_peripheral/*.*
    )
endif()

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/test/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
